contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Rika Komatsu'''|小松 里歌|Komatsu Rika|born February 25{{year missing|date=January 2011}} in [[Kōchi, Kōchi|Kōchi]]}} is a Japanese [[Voice acting in Japan|voice actress]]. ==Voice roles== ===Anime=== *[[Animation Runner Kuromi]] (Announcer, Yuri) *[[Animation Runner Kuromi 2]] (Yuri) *[[Boys Be...]] (Jyunna Morio) *[[Futari wa Pretty Cure]] (Butler Zakenna A) *Futari wa Pretty Cure Max Heart (Pyuan) *Hijikata Toshizou - Shiro no Kiseki (Hijikata Toshizou (child)) *[[Kirby: Right Back at Ya!]] ([[Tuff (Kirby)|Bun]]) *[[Mamotte Shugogetten]] (Letter (ep.7), resident (ep.8)) *[[Matantei Loki Ragnarok]] (Reiya Ooshima) *Nessa no Haou Gandalla (Emma Branton) *[[Oden]][[kun]] (Chikuwabu, Ginnan bouzu, Susie) *Ojarumaru (Kintarou Sakata (ep.181-270)) *[[One Piece]] ([[List of One Piece minor characters#Chabo|Chabo]], Marie) *Shin Hakkenden (Noburu) *[[SD Gundam Sangokuden Brave Battle Warriors]] (Kan-pei Gundam) *[[Tokyo Mew Mew]] (Lucha, Pudding's mother (ep.20)) *[[Yu-Gi-Oh!]] (Female student, Kaoruko Bodyguard (ep.19)) ===Miscellaneous=== *[[Tokyo Mew Mew]] (songs performance: ''My Sweet Heart'' (OP), ''Glider'', ''My Days ~Ano Hi wo Wasurenai~'', ''Hello Brand-New Love ~Koi wa Sugi Soko~'') ===Videogames=== *[[Dynasty Warriors 3]] (Diao-chan) *[[Dynasty Warriors 4]] (Diao-chan) *[[Dynasty Warriors 4: Empires]] (Edit officer) *[[Dynasty Warriors 8]] (Diao-chan) *Dream Mix TV: World Fighters (Kiji) *Dream Mix TV: World Fighters (Minibonbi) *Dream Mix TV: World Fighters (Momotaro) *Riviera -Yakusoku no Chi-" (Rose) *[[Rune Factory Frontier]] (Lucia/Minerva) *[[Growlanser]] & [[Growlanser II: The Sense of Justice]] (Louise Fallsmeyer) ==External links== *{{ann|people|id=4562|name=Rika Komatsu}} *[http://www.aoni.co.jp/actress/ka/komatsu-rika.html Rika Komatsu] at Aoni Production. {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Komatsu Rika | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese voice actor | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Kōchi, Kōchi]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Komatsu Rika}} [[Category:Japanese voice actresses]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] [[Category:Living people]] {{Japan-voice-actor-stub}}
